All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    AleaCommand
    Handles the alea command.
    BackCommand
    Handles the back command.
    Beamer
    A beamer is an item used to teleport yourself to a previous room.
    Command
    A command represents a particular instruction asked by the user.
    CommandWord
    Representation for all the valid commands of the game.
    CommandWords
    This class is part of the "World of Zuul" application.
    CompilateurPersonage  
    Console
    Uses the terminal as the primary interface of the game.
    Cookie
    The cookie is an item that increase the maximum weight that can be carried by the player.
    DropCommand
    Handles the drop command.
    Game
    This is the entry point for this Zuul project.
    GameEngine Deprecated. 
    GameEngine
    This class is the main class of the "World of Zuul" application.
    GoCommand
    Handles the go command.
    HelpCommand
    Handles the help command.
    Item
    This class defines the representation of an object in the Zuul project.
    Item.CannotManageItemException
    This error is related to the fact that an action requested in the item management is not possible.
    ItemCommand
    Handles the item command.
    ItemList Deprecated.
    use ThingList instead.
    JavaFX
    This class is responsible for initializing the JavaFX thread as well as correctly setting up the main game window and launching the controller.
    LoadCommand
    Handles the charge command.
    LockedRoom
    Represents a closed room accessible only under a certain condition.
    LookCommand
    Handles the look pkg_command.
    MovingPersonage
    Represents a non-player character who can move.
    Parser
    This class is part of the "World of Zuul" application.
    Personage
    Represents a non-player character.
    Player
    This class is intended to manage the player state through the game.
    QuitCommand
    Handles the quit command.
    Room
    This room represents a room in the Zuul game.
    Room.CannotAccessRoomException
    If a room is not found.
    RoomRandomizer
    This class is responsible to handle the randomness of selecting a room for special purposes like the transporter room.
    TakeCommand
    Handles the take command.
    TalkCommand
    Handles the talk command.
    TechnicianPersonage
    Represents a technician in the game.
    TestCommand
    Handles the test command.
    ThingList<T>
    This class is used to represent a list of things such as items, personages...
    Timer
    This class represents a movement constraint based on an internal timer.
    Timer.TimerLimitException
    Indicates that the timer has completed its countdown.
    TransporterRoom
    A transporter room that move you to a random room.
    UnknownCommand
    Handles the unknown behaviour.
    UseCommand
    Handles the use command.
    UserInterface
    This interface represents all the constraints that a class must integrate to be the Graphical User Interface (GUI).
    Utils
    This class is meant to provide simple utilities functions for the Zuul game.
    ZuulController
    This class is the controller of our JavaFX view.
